Paragraph: 4a-n,8 Main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymers with 9,9-dialkylfluorene as donor unit and benzothiadiazole as acceptor unit have been extensively studied as donor components in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 4a-n |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene |
| benzothiadiazole |
| BHJ PSCs |

Note: I'm assuming that BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Solar Cells) is considered a material in this context. If not, then it can be excluded from the list.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that all of the identified entities are materials. Therefore, the updated table is as follows:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 4a-n |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene |
| benzothiadiazole |
| BHJ PSCs |

All of these entities are materials that are mentioned in the paragraph.
